1.content: Before we start what are you going to be.
1.title: Welcome

11.content:
Experiment: AW57
Project nick name: Tsunami
Species: Riolu X Buizel
Appearance: A Riolu with Orange and Blue fur (Orange replacing the blue and blue replacing the black). He also has two cream colored spots on his back and Two black lines on each side of his face. He has also got blue fins on each his of his arms, A yellow rubber like flotation collar, and two tails with cream coloration on the tips.
Notes: Was originally a normal Riolu he was captured and experimented on given attributes of many Pokemon types to develop an ultimate battle Pokemon. He was given Buizel DNA to increase his speed attributes, this also is the cause for his mutation.
11.title: Riolu X Buizel.

choices: You find unknown strength and you break free.
A Pokemon comes in and breaks you out.
The man opens your container and tells you to escape.
111.content:
You sit in a glass tube curled up into a ball. It has been a week since you have been captured and you are afraid of this scary place. Tall men in white coats surround you looking at you with evil eyes. They have poked you with needles and strapped you to scary devices. You did not look the same as your formal self at the meadow. Your fur changed color, your tail split into two, fins grew from your arms, and A rubbery thing grew around your neck. You can understand what the humans are saying around you but most of the time you block it out. Today you see two men speaking with a man on the strange window.
(Man 1)”Sir we have received word that the international police have found our lab.”
(Man 2)”And they are going to investigate the facility. What should we do.”
(???)”We can’t let them find our work. You must destroy all the work.”
(Man 1)”But sir we can’t. these are living breathing creatures.”
(???)”I don’t care just do it. Out!”
The window turned black and you where more scared then you have ever been in your life. One of the men left the room wile one walks over to your container. The man looks at you with sympathy seeing how scared you where. Then…
111.title: A scary place.

1111.content: You then feel a strange energy flow though your body. Your eyes start to glow and you stand up on and you punch the tube shattering it into a million pieces. The man try’s to grab a shock pole but you jump up and kick him to the floor. You run and break though the door like it was nothing and you run down the hall. You look and see tubes containing other Pokemon experiments. You Create a bone staff and you start smashing tubes one after the other. You continue on freeing the Pokemon as you inform other Pokemon to help others escape. After what seems like hours you find an exit. You see cars with red and blue flashing lights surrounding the building with people approaching seeing what the chaos was. You pass by them followed by a small group of Pokemon experiments as you run to...
1111.title: You find unknown strength and you break free.

11111.content: You keep running till you find a clearing in the forest. All of the energy you had seemed to be fading away as you collapse on the ground. You look back and you see that two experiments have followed you. You see a Vulpix with Charizard wings (IB56:Crimson) and a shinx with puffy patches of fur on its body with black strips (LR21:Storm). All three of you rest in until you here something moving in the bushes. What is it...
11111.title: The Woods.

111111.content: You and the others shake in fear as you see a large shadow approach you. "Don't be afraid I'm a friend." the figure says stepping out into the shadows. You see a Mightyena with grey and red fur with red markings around his eyes and mouth. "My name is Trickster." he says with a warm smile "I wish to thank you. You are the one who freed me." "Well, your welcome I guess." you say getting on your feet "I'm Tsunami, and these are my friends Crimson and Storm." "Hello." Crimson says in a quiet voice. "Hiya." Storm says. "Well it's nice to meet you." Trickster says "Say what are you planning to do any ways." "I don't know, right now we are trying to find a safe place to stay." you say with your head down. "Well me and a bunch of other experiments are staying at a hidden cave not to far from here you could stay there." Trickster replies "It's the least we could do for one of the ones who helped save us." You think for a moment and you say...
111111.title: Meeting Trickster.

1111111.content: "That would be great." you reply happily "Thank you so much." "Don't mention it." Trickster replies "Just follow me." You, Crimson, and Storm follow Trickster thought the forest until you come to a cave tucked away by rocks and bushes. Once inside you are surrounded by many experiments of all kinds. "Sir I have brought one of the experiments that freed us." Trickster said addressing an large experiment sitting at a small crevice in the cave. You could not tell what it was cause of the little light you had to see with. "Young one you have done a great good." the experiment says in a old voice "We are grateful to have you in our little sanctuary." Many of the pokemon in the cave cheered and you look away not knowing what to think. "Come with me Tsunami." Trickster asks you "Your and you friends could stay in my area." You follow Trickster into a small cavern with an opening letting some light shine in. You see several beds made out of leafs, grass, and some torn pieces of fabric. "Thank you Trickster." You say politely. "No problem any thing for a friend." Trickster replies. You now decide to...
1111111.title: A safe place.

11111112.content: "I think I'll step out for a little bit." you say to the others. "No problem Tsunami" Trickster replies "I'll keep an eye on your friends till you get back." You step out of the cave and you look up at the night sky. You don't know why but something about seeing the full moon gives you a good feeling. As you walk though the forest you see many normal Pokemon stairing at you. Some of the looks where of disgust wile some where of fear wile others where of curiosity. As you walk you hear a noise in the distance. You crawl into a small bush and you peek and see...
11111112.title: A moon light stroll.

111111121.content: You peek out and you see what looks like a Garchomp mixed with a Charizard. You watch quietly as you see it cut an apple off of a tree. "He must be one of the other Experiment from the lab" you wisper to yourself. Just then it uses Air Slash and it cuts off the top of the bush you where hidding in. You ducked down just in time to get out of the attacks way but when you look up you see the masive experiment stareing at you. "Please don't hurt me." you plead shakeing slightly. You look and you see him look at you with sympathy and he then starts to leave. "Where are you going?" you ask. "I'm going to try and find somewhere to stay." It says planly. "Come with me then, a bunch of us are staying in a cave" You offer. The experiment looks at you and thinks for a second. Dose he go with you?
111111121.title: A big experiment.

1111111211.content: You look at him and you see him nod. "Great, follow me." you say grabbing his claw. You lead him though the forest until you reach the cave where Storm and Crimson was waiting for you. They both seem uneasy seeing the large experiment you brought back with you. "It's alright guys he's a friend." you say smiling "These are my friend's Crimson and Storm. The Experiment nods and he then looks at you. "What about you?" he asks you "What's your name?" "My name is Tsunami." you reply kindly. "Nice to meet you all, My name is Drago." He says giving a friendly smile (Well as friendly as a sharp toothy smile could be). You lead him though the cave where he was greeted by all the other experiments. You then decide to...
1111111211.title: Your new friend Drago.

choices: In the middle of the night.
11111112112.content:
You yawn as today has been a long day. "Hey look who's getting tired." You turn and you see Trickster looking at you "You should get some sleep." you don't argue as you walk over to one of the beds and fall right into it. You soon fall fast asleep looking at the moon shining though the opening.

Meanwhile on the other side of the forest lies a small Pokemon Ranger station. This is the home of 5 Pokemon Rangers that patrol around these wood's. The video phone starts to ring and one of the rangers stumbles from his room to answer. "*Yawn* Ranger station 32." the boy says tiredly. "I'm sorry to wake you but I thought I would a bit of a head's up on your next assignment." the man says on the other end "I'm sure you are aware of that shady Pokemon lab in the forest." "Yeah it was on the news." the boy replies "It said that they where doing strange mutation experiments on Pokemon there." "Yes well even though they got a lot of Pokemon from the facility and brought them to new homes most of them escaped into the surrounding forest." the man says "The forest has been closed off so no trainer would wander in. That leave's you and the other Pokemon Rangers to try and help with trying to transfer the experiments to a much suitable home." "Under stood." the boy says tiredly. "Good, You will get more info at tomorrow mornings briefing. over and out." the man says as he hangs up. "Hey what was that about?" the boy turns and sees one of his partner Pokemon looking at him. "I just got a little info on our next mission." the boy says. "Well that's sounds fun." the Pokemon says to the boy. The boy yawns and stumbles slightly. "I think we should get back to bed before you decide to fall over on the floor." the Pokemon says wile grabbing the boy's hand and leading him back to the room. Both the Ranger and his partner fall asleep so they could be ready for tomorrow.

Back to you at the cave you wake up...

*Just to note the Pokemon Rangers here can speak to Pokemon and they can have more then one partner Pokemon. (The one mentioned above has 4 Pokemon partners.)
11111112112.title: Bed time.

111111121121.content: You wake up greeted by the morning sunlight pouring though the opening in the cave. "Good morning Tsunami." Trickster says with a smile. "Morning Trickster." you reply. You look and you see that Trickster has brought some food. "Some of the bigger Pokemon has found some food last night." Trickster says "I'm planning on going and gathering some more food in the forest. Do you want to go with me?" Do you go with him?
111111121121.title: The start of a new day.

choices: Trickster has come back with help.
1111111211211.content: "Sure I would like to go with you." You reply. You grab an apple from the pile of food and you follow Trickster though the forest. As you and Trickster walk you see normal Pokemon stair at you from a distance. You try your best to ignore it but it is very hard. After a few minutes you and Trickster have found a ton of berries to bring back. You and Trickster start filling up log until you couldn’t fill it any more. "Wow we sure did alot of work." you say beaming. "Yeah I don't think we can bring this back with just the two of us." Trickster comments "I'm going back to get some help. Can you guard it till I get back?" "Sure leave it to me." you reply. With that Trickster rushes back to the cave and you sit down by your stash. Then...
1111111211211.title: Looking for food.

11111112112111.content: You were just about to dose off when you hear a twig snap in the distance. "Trickster, is that you?" you say. You hear no reply as you hear a bush rustling. "W-who's there." you studier. You continue to shake in fear as the sound gets closer and closer. "Stay away!" You shout as you charge up a water pulse and launch it into the bushes. You hear a loud crash and you see two shadowy figures leap out of the way. You run and hide behind the log as the two figures start to approach. You soon see...
11111112112111.title: You feel your being watched.

111111121121111.content: You peak around the log and you see a human wearing a red vest and a yellow scarf and a Floatzel standing next to him. "What shot that Water Pulse at us?" the Floatzel says looking around. "I'm not sure?" the human says as he then notices the log full of berries "What is this doing here?" You stay tucked down and you close your eyes as you listen to the two talking. "Hey there little guy." you open your eyes and you see the human and the Floatzel looking at you. What do you do?
111111121121111.title: A Ranger and his Pokemon.

1111111211211112.content: You freeze in fear as you see them stare right at you. "Hey don't be afraid." the human says "We won't hurt you." He reaches his hand out and you flinch which makes him retreat. "I think he's a little skittish considering what he has been though." the Floatzel stats. "I know." the human replies wile looking back at you "Do you have a name little guy?" "T-t-tsunami." you studier out. "Nice to meet you Tsunami." the human says with a smile "My name is Donald and this is Sora my partner." You start to feel slightly more at ease as the two smile at you. "So what are you doing out here?" the Sora asks. "I-I was gathering berries to bring back to the others." you say nervously "My friend just left to get help to bring them back." When you mentioned that you see Donald has gone into deep thought. Then...
1111111211211112.title: Meet Donald and Sora.

11111112112111122.content: Just then you hear something in the distance. "Sounds like your friends are coming." Donald says "That means it’s time for us to go." Then Donald and Sora take off in to the forest. "We'll see you later." you hear Donald shout as he disappears from sight. You then turn your attention to the noise and you see...
11111112112111122.title: You hear something comeing.

choices: No, it's best to keep it to your self.
111111121121111221.content: You look and you see Trickster along with Drago and an Aerodactyl experiment (Aero). “Hey Tsunami I found some help.” Trickster says kindly. You don’t say anything for a wile as you think about that Ranger. “Hey Tsunami, are you ok?” Drago asks out of concern. “Oh, I’m fine.” you say trying to shake it off. “Well let’s get these berries back to the cave shale we.” Aero says picking up one end of the log. Drago grabs the other end and they carry it though the forest wile you and Trickster pick up the berries that fall out. Once you got back to the cave everyone cheered and was happy to see how much food you found. You pay no attention as you look back at the forest in deep thought. “Who was that human.” you think to your self “He was way different from the humans from the lab. Can I trust him?” “Hey what’s wrong?” you turn and you see Drago looking at you “You have been acting weird ever since we got back. Did something happen out there?” You wonder if you should tell him or not. Do you tell him?
111111121121111221.title: Deep thought.

1111111211211112212.content: You decide it would be best to keep it your little secrete. "I'm fine really." you say calmly "I just kinda took off to my own little world that's all." Drago look's at you strangely. You could tell by the look in his eyes that he wasn't buying it. "*Sigh* Ok." Drago replies "But if you need to talk you know where to find me." "Ok." you reply in relief. As Drago leaves you continue to look out into the forest. "Donald, who are you." you think to your self. You walk back into the cave and you get some food. After you finish you see it’s starting to get late and most of the littler experiments are heading off to bed and you start to follow. “Good night guys.” you say as you lay on your bed. Wile Crimson, Storm, and Trickster fall fast asleep you lay awake. Then…
1111111211211112212.title: Your little secrete.

11111112112111122121.content: You slept soundly until you hear a twig snap out side. "Trickster is that you?" you say as you jump up. You glance over and you see that Trickster is still sleeping soundly. You keep hearing noises out side which scares you a bit. You decide to investigate and you slowly sneak out of the cave making sure no one sees you. Once you were outside you see a light shining right behind a pile of rocks. You walk around keeping a good distance away from the source. You then see...
11111112112111122121.title: *Snap*

choices: One of the humans from the lab!
111111121121111221212.content: You soon see that the shadow belongs to a human. "Oh-no they found this place." you whisper to yourself. You shake thinking about how much danger all the experiments could be in. "I must do something." you say as you run towards the rock and leap up on it. Slowly peek over the edge and you see the human peeking around the rock looking at the cave. You couldn't see what he looked like cause of the shadows cast by his light but you could see he was holding something else. "Take this!" you shout as you leap down and kick him right behind his head. As he falls to the ground his light then shines right on him and you see it's...
111111121121111221212.title: Human!

1111111211211112212122.content: You look and you see a familiar red vest and yellow scarf. "Donald?" you say as you walk up and look at his face "What are you doing here?" Donald says nothing cause you knocked him out cold. "Oh dear, what have I done?" you say to your self feeling slightly panicked "What am I going to do?" Just then you here someone approaching behind you. Who is it?
1111111211211112212122.title: The ranger from before.

11111112112111122121221.content: it turns out to be sora she/he sees donald then runs over to him looking at you and says "wat did you do?" and you start crying and tell sora you didn't mean it you were trying to protect your friends and sora nods picks up donald you say sorry for the unnecessary attack and takes him back to their cabin and he slowly comes to sora sees this he asks what happened sora tells him and he....
11111112112111122121221.title: His Floatzel, Sora.

111111121121111221212211.content:
Sora let out a sigh when you finished explaining that you didn't recognize who it was until you accidentally knocked him out. "So... you're not mad?" You ask a little worried that Sora was just hiding any anger.

"No, it's fine. You were merely defending your friends, just like you said. But believe me when I tell you, Donald would probably be one of the nicest humans you will ever meet. He's my best friend after all." After your experiences with the lab, you still found it strange that a human could be a pokemon's friend.
111111121121111221212211.title: understands

112.content:
Experiment:DS95
Project Name:Drago
Species:Garchomp X Charizard
Description:Charizards head on Garchomps body.
Charizards wings but still has Garchomps dorsal fin.
Garchomps arms with Charizards hands at the end by the fins.
Garchomps tail with Charizards flame.
Colour:Black with red running down from the front of your neck to the end of your tail.
Red irises.
What now?
112.title: Next experiment.

1121.content:
You stood there in the large tube.
Watching,Waiting.
You saw how the other Pokemon were treated.
Normally you wouldnt care for others but this is an exception.
One of the scientists comes over to your tube.
He is teasing you with food.
You finally snap.
You hold your two Garchomp fins up to the glass and slash through the glass.
You throw the scientist across the lab.
Any Pokemon that was awake cheered which woke up the others.
You slash all the containers freeing all the Pokemon.
You watch as all the Pokemon escape.
You then release a powerful Flamethrower destroying all the equipment.
There is a large explosion behind you as you fly into the night sky.
Where do you land?
1121.title: Go With Drago

11212.content:
You land beside a lake for a drink.
After you get a drink you watch as the normal Pokemon stay far away from you.
You are beginning to get hungry.
You see an apple hanging from the tree.
Air Slash you say as a blast of air is launched from your arm fin.
The apple falls to the ground.
As you pick it up you notice you are being watched.
Air Slash you say as you cut the top of the bush.
You look in and see?
11212.title: Lake

1121211.content:
You look in and see what you mistook for a Buisel.
Please dont hurt me he says.
As soon as you notice he is an experiment you decide to leave him.
Where are you going he asks?
I am going to try and find somewhere to stay.
Come with me then a bunch of us are staying in a cave he says.
Do you go with him?
1121211.title: Yes

11212111.content:
You follow him to a hidden area.
You see two more experiments run up to him.
They both pause when they see you.
You try to smile but only succeed in baring your teeth.
Its alright guys hes a friend.
You are shocked to hear him call you a friend.
This is Crimson he says indicating to a Vulpix with Charizard wings.
And this is Storm indicating to the Shinx with puffy patches of fur on his body with black stripes.
What about you,you ask what is your name?
My name is Tsunami.
Nice to meet you all I am Drago.
Ok how about you come in?
11212111.title: Yes

112121111.content:
You follow the trio down the cave.
You begin to wonder how long this cave is.
You finally arrive at the cave base.
You are greeted by?
112121111.title: Alright

1121211111.content:
You see dozens of Experiments.
They all pause.
You start to feel nervous.
Then one of the older Pokemon shouts out.
He is the one who saved us.
Suddenly there is an uproar of cheers from all the Pokemon.
You are embarrassed as you never got this much attention.
You leave out what you hope is an actual smile.
You are touched on the back.
Who is it?
1121211111.title: A Bunch Of Experiments

11212111112.content:
You turn around and see another Experiment.
Suddenly you remember this Experiment.
He was in the container beside you in the lab.
Hey Drago I just wanted to say thanks.
Your welcome.......?


Aero:An Aerodactyl Experiment.
He has Aerodactyls Head Wings and Tail.
He also has Kabutops Body Arms and Legs.
He is Grey in color.


Slash:A Scyther Experiment.
He has everything Scyther has except his Abdomen.
This is replaced with Sevipers Tail.
He is Black and Purple in color.
11212111112.title: An Older Experiment

112121111121.content:
Hey how about you stay with me?
Alright so how have you been Aero?
Fine,fine.
So did everyone get out?
Yeah Im not sure about the humans.
Later on?
112121111121.title: Aero

1121211111211.content:
As the young Pokemon sleep.
The older ones including yourself gather around a large fire.
They all begin to tell stories.
So Drago asks Aero?
Yes you reply.
How did you find this place?
The young one Tsunami found me and lead me here.
What now?
1121211111211.title: Telling Stories

11212111112111.content:
Some Pokemon bring in food.
You notice they have very little.
You take an apple and cut it in half and pass it on.
So Drago what are you planning on doing tommorow?
I dont know what are you doing?
You can help us gather food.
Or raid a human settlement for food.
Ok you say.
I`ll help....
11212111112111.title: Dinner

112121111121111.content:
Great Aero replies.
The Next Day.
You,Aero an two other experiments leave for a human town.
The other two are Strike(Flygon body and head mixed with Salamance wings)
Swift(A Lucario with Swellow wings and tail same colour as Swellow)
You see a food storage.
Its in there guys you say indicating to a large ware house.
You all fill your bags with food.
When you are about to leave?
112121111121111.title: Raid

choices: No I Want To Battle For My Freedom
1121211111211111.content:
When you are about to leave the door opens and a Pokemon Ranger walks in.
He is shocked to see you.(Pokemon Rangers can understand Pokemon)
Aero make sure you all get out safely you say.Were not leaving you Drago right guys Aero replies.
Yeah they both answered.If you dont get out of here with this food there wont be much more left for the others.
They all stare quietly at this.Go now you order.First you save us from the lab now this you are the greatest Pkemon ever Drago Aero answers as they leave.The Pokemon Ranger hearing all of this stares at you.
You ready for a fight.You are shocked to see that he stands aside and is giving you an oppurtunity to leave.
Do you take it?
1121211111211111.title: Busted

11212111112111111.content: You stare at him to make sure that this isnt a trick.You see honesty in his eyes.You walk past him and begin to lift your body from the ground.Thank you,you say knowing that he wont know what you said.Your welcome he replied.You shocked hearing this begin to fly back to the cave to meet up with the others to make sure that tey arrived safely.You arrive at the cave to find no one at the entrance.Something must be wrong you think as you rush to the to the deepest cavern hoping that nothing has happened.You arrive to find..
11212111112111111.title: Yes

112121111121111111.content:
You look around to see that everyoe is safe.Drago Aero says happy to see you.Aero you say rejoicing in the fact that everyone is ok.Drago you must be hungry Aero asks?Yeah did everyone get back fine ypu ask?Yeah yeah stop worrying
Drago everything is fine.Sorry Aero its just that Ive never been attached to anyone before you confess.Its alright Drago both Pokemon used in making you lived solitary lives its natural that you would feel this way.Thanks again Aero you say.Now how about we get some real food.Yeah you say cheering up.Over dinner most Pokemon were quiet with the exception of a few younger Pokemon.Then you notice something.Where is Tsunami you ask?He left a while ago with Trickster to get some food.Are they back yet you ask?No another Experiment tells you.Suddenly a Pokemon comes in. It is....
112121111121111111.title: Everything Is Fine

1121211111211111111.content: Hey Trickster says as he enters.You stand up and ask him where is Tsunami?Hes back in the forest I came to get some help with the log we filled Trickster replies.I will come and help you offer.Me too Aero adds.Great Trickster says lets go.You follow Trickster through the forest.The log should just be ahead of here Trickster explains.When you get there Tsunami is...
1121211111211111111.title: Trickster

11212111112111111111.content:
You see Tsunami by himself. “Hey Tsunami I found some help.” Trickster says kindly.Hey Tsunami, are you ok?” you ask out of concern.“Oh, I’m fine.” he replies.“Well let’s get these berries back to the cave shall we” Aero says picking up one end of the log.You grab the other end of the log and carry it through the forest while Trickster and Tsunami pick up any berries that fall out.Once you got back to the cave the others cheered for how much berries Trickster and Tsunami had gathered.Tsunami goes off by himself and he is still in thought.“Hey what’s wrong?” he turns to see you looking at him “You have been acting weird ever since we got back. Did something happen out there?”You ask?
Does he tell you?
11212111112111111111.title: Alone

112121111121111111112.content:
Im fine really he says calmly I just took off to my own little world thats all.You gave him a strange look and the look in your eyes could tell him that you werent buying it.Sigh.Ok you reply.But if you need to talk you know where to find me you say.Ok Tsunami replies.You leave to get warm by the fire.You turn to look at Tsunami again before sitting down.
What now?
112121111121111111112.title: No

1121211111211111111121.content: You lie on your bed of leaves and fall asleep.During the night you hear what sounds like twigs breaking.You open your eyes and see Tsunami running out to investigate.You follow him quickly.When you get outside you see that the sound was coming from a human.What happened?
1121211111211111111121.title: Go To Sleep

1122.content:
Experiment:FT53
Project Name:Raze
Species:Bulbasaur X Charmander
Description:You were a normal looking Bulbasaur until you got kidnapped by those freaks. They choose to inject you with some Charmander DNA and you start to change.
First your skin color stay the name but the spots you had changed color as it changed to orange.
Second your bulb started to change color as well as it went red like Charmander flame on the tail.
Third you grew a tail which is the same skin color Bulbasaur have, However the flame isn't red, it green.
What happen next?
1122.title: Bulbasaur x Charmander

choices: A Pokemon Ranger and his Partner
11221.content:
You have been trapped for weeks and you were sleeping until you heard the other pokemons cheer so you woke up to see that the experiment of a Charizard and a Garchomp breaking the others out. You started to cheer then the pokemon set you out so you can make your escape as well. You started to run out with the other pokemons into the forest. However you got apart from the group and didn't know where they were.
"Man where are they?" Raze say in his mind.
"Man no one is going to want me. I'm a freak." he say again in his mind as he keep walking until he heard a sound and turn around to see....
11221.title: Escape

11222.content:
Experiment: 9637
Name: Tank
Species: Blastoise, Tyranitar, Aerodactyl
Looks like: The body of Tyranitar with Blastoie's shell and cannons. Has Aerodactyl's wings and can fly just as fast as a regular Aerodactyl. The top half is dark grey brown as the bottom half is dark navy blue.
11222.title: New Experiment

113.content:
Experiment: CO65
Project nick name: Cheswott
Species: Chespin X Oshawott
Appearance: A Chespin with blue, brown-blue, and light-brown fur (blue fur replacing the green fur, brown-blue fur replacing the light brown fur, and white fur replacing the dark-brown fur) He also has the Oshawott shell and his tall is the same green and red tail.
Notes: Was originally a normal Chespin. He was given Oshawott DNA that was the cause of his mutation.
113.title: Cheswott

choices: Go with Dracore and his evolutions
114.content:
Experiment: D6B
Codename: Dracore
Description: was once a normal Axew before being captured and being injected with the DNA of other dragon types. He has the same basic torso and head but with dratini's tail and side fins as well as Deino's black fur and wings along with Bagon's armor, his legs match those of a Terrapinch and his arms have the fins of a Gible on them. His scales have changed color to match that of Dratini's and his fur is the color of a Terrapinch, the color of his head though us the color of Gible's head. He is the only one capable of evolution even if it is only temporary and while he is evolved he can evolve again and become even more powerful, but that evolution is a last resort and is rarly seen his evolutions are.
Experiment: D6E1
Codename: Dragales
And
Experiment: D6E2
Codename: Dragallent
Notes: is really powerful and is hard to make friends with but once friends with it if you betray his feelings be prepared for a dragon rage strong enough to make an explosion loud enough to be heard by the entire region(yeah he is that powerful. Now do you know why he is so shy.... Because most of the time his friends betray him!!!!). Most of the time he evolves into D6E1 to protect his friends, but if the bully won't quit he goes a step further and evolves into D6E2 which rarly happens because most bullies are scared of his first evolution. Some might say Dracore is to powerful for his own good, but other people disagree to be specific Dracore's best friend and his strongest rival.
114.title: Dragon type to the 6th power

115.content:
Experiment Name: F073
Codename: Icyfire
Original species: Ninetales
Genetics added: Glaceon
Description: A Ninetales that was captured and experimented on, thus making it a cross breed with Glaceon before many experiments escaped. It's barely smaller than your average Ninetales. It has light blue fur replacing the cream colour, and the darker blue diamond shape on its back. The tips of its tails remained orange, although they changed to a fairly flat shape, and stayed very furry. Its ears now more resemble a Glaceon in addition to having gained the icy crystal-like head piece. It kept the general shape of a Ninetales, Including the head and two fur tufts, both of which stayed cream coloured. Finally, the fur by its paws also changed to darker blue.
Tests show it to have perfected fusing fire and ice attacks. Has gained an antisocial nature, most likely from time in the facility. Still has psychic power of a normal Ninetales.
Status: Unknown, likely in wild.
115.title: Icyfire, or something else?

12.content:
Dark Matter(153)B

A feminine creature that is a cross between a Absol and Espeon. The body style is beast-like. She has light pinkish fur that covers her body and forms thicker around her neck. She has large ears like Espeon, but has a black area and a black growth forming out of her right ear. A black gemstone is in the middle of her two red eyes. Her tail is split at the end similar to Espeon but has blade-like growths on the ends.
12.title: Dark Matter(153)B

122.content: then what about anastaria she is a cross between a gardevoir and a mismagius, she has the same hair as a gardevoir except it's dark purple she also has the hat like part that a mismagius has, the dress like part of her body looks like a cross between a gardevoirs and a mismagius in other words like a rather torn version of the gardevoir dress, she also has mostly white skin like gardevoir and she has the same eyes as a mismagius she is also rather calm and collected but also loves a good prank now and then. so do you choose her
122.title: Another experiment

131.content:
Roy is a average 15 year old. He had black hair with blue streaks. His eyes are a deep red. Roy wears a shirt that is half blue, half black. The decals are the corresponding color. One sleeve is shorter than the other. Roy so wears blue silky shorts and black tennis shoes. One thing that is strange about Roy is that he in invulnerable to electricity.

---

I was walking down a forest path slowly, trying to enjoy the sunny clear day. I was heading to my family's reunion, which was being held in Littleroot Town. I got to the edge of town, and began looking around. I never have been to Littleroot, or the Sinnoh region at all. I was from Unova, and every Pokemon I saw was knew to me. I was hoping to find my cousins, but I was lost.

"Need some help?" asked a voice.

I turned and saw a small person in a black cloak. It sounded like a old woman.

"May I help you sonny?" she asked.

"I am looking for the Logsdon residence" I said.

"Please follow me."

She walked along a building and I followed her. Suddenly, some people grabbed me and pulled me into a warehouse. The woman laughed, and the cloak came off. A talk man with strange hair appeared. I felt them reach for my pokeballs, and I tried to fight back. They jabbed me with an electric pole, but it did nothing. The man looked surprised, and I punched him. My pokeballs were knocked to the side, and some other guy scanned them with a scanner. I quickly grabbed the balls and threw them, unknowing where they would land. I was knocked over the head with something, and everything went black. When I woke up...
131.title: Roy

1313.content:
I woke up in a life chamber. A large ray was over it. I saw some scientists typing on the computers, and I banged on the glass.

"What are you doing?" I yelled.

The scientist turned and laughed. "Don't try to talk. That container you are in is indestrucable and soundproof. You can hear me, but I cannot hear you. Let me tell you what we are going to do with you. We are a secret organization creating new powerful Pokemon by fusing them together. We heard that a powerful trainer from Unova was coming to Sinnoh, so we got there as soon as we could. You were so gullible. We were planning on just taking your Pokemon, but we have something better."

What could be better?

He typed a few keys, and the six Pokemon I had with me were on screen. Scallop the Dewott, Fuzz the Swoobat, Spike the Ferrothorn, Jolt the Galvantula, Speckle the Hydregeion, and Wisp the Lampent.

"We obtained the DNA of all six of your Pokemon" he continued. "But, since we only have a small fragment of DNA, we need a base."

Where are you going to find a base...oh wait, I'm the base!

He pressed a few more buttons, and the computer began to talk. "Now acessing DNA files of: Dewott, Swoobat, Ferrothorn, Galvantula, Hydregeion, and Lampent."

The ray gun above me started to hum, and a multicolored beam shot down. I screamed in pain, but no one heard me. I could feel my insides changing and rearranging. My bones grew and shrunk in other places. I nearly passed out from all the pain.
1313.title: LIfe changing

13131.content:
Experiment 12O
Codename: Unova
Height: 2' 4"
Weight: 95lbs

Unova is a cross between six different Unova Pokemon. He has the lower body of a Galvantula, with some armor spikes from Ferrothorn. He has the upper body of a Dewott, with arms like a Hydreigon. Two wings like a Swoobat are out from it's back. Unova's head is like a Dewott, but he has the eyes like a Galvantula only they are red instead of blue, and a cap like a Lampent.

---

I slowly opened my eyes. Everything was fuzzy at first, but then everything became clear. I stoodup, and looked around. I was in some strange container. Several humans were around me. One was in a black suit, the others wore a lab coat. The man in the suit was staring at me. I slowly stepped backward. I tumbled though.

"Are you sure this thing is dangerous?" he asked.

"Yes sir" said a person. "Based on the information on the Pokemon we fused, this one is probably the most powerful."

"Put it with the others for now."

I was pushed off to somewhere. The container stopped, and I was shoved into a bigger room. Around me were several different creatures. The way they looked did not look right. Some backed up, others approached me. One was...

(Author's note: The two choices at the bottom are free for whatever you can think of if anyone is adding. But just leave at least one of them open.)
13131.title: Unova

131311.content:
Experiment 31F
Codename: Brawl
Height: 5' 11"
Weight: 169lbs

Brawl is a experiment fused with the DNA of three Pokemon who are excellent battlers from all three ranges. These Pokemon are Lucario, Magmortar, and Machamp. Brawl has the entire stature of Lucario. He has four arms, with hands like Machamp but with style similar to Lucario. His hands also have a small hole in them that can shoot out flames like Magmortar's. His fur has the coloration of Magmortar, but has the style of Lucario. Brawl wears a belt like a Machamp, and his shoulders have "flames" on them like Magmortar. His head is exactly like a Lucario's except for the coloration.

---

The creature that approached me was very menacing looking. He was more than twice as big as me. And from some of the scars on his body, made him look like someone not to mess with. He, and a few others, circled around me.

"What is that?" asked one.

"Brawl, have you ever seen anything like it?" asked another.

The creature that was the first to approach me was named Brawl. "I have seen many Pokemon fusions" he said, "But I have never seen anything like this."

The started to close in, and I had no way out. I was lost, scared, and confused. I just trembled there on the floor.

"Please...d-don't hurt m-me..." I muttered.
131311.title: Experiment 31F(Brawl)

1313111.content:
Brawl stepped closer and closer. I closed up, preparing for a attack. However, I felt something completely different. I felt a warm hand on my shoulder. I looked up and saw Brawl. He was smiling, "I won't hurt you."

I eased up and tried standing up. He was more than twice as big as me. I decided to ask him, "Where am I? Who are you? Why am I here?"

"I'm sure you have a lot of questions kid" he said. "But I'll start at the beginning. This place is a human organization to make stronger Pokemon. They take the DNA of selected Pokemon and fuse them together, making us. Some of us are wild Pokemon, others are trainer's Pokemon. I was once a wild Lucario, until this place captured me. I was fused with Magmortar and Machamp DNA. Now, I am Experiment 31F, or Brawl as my codename. But, what's yours?"

Brawl walked over to the container that held me, and looked at it. He stopped at a white label, "Ah! Here it is! You are Experiment 12O, or Unova."

"Did you say Unova?" said a voice.

---

Experiment 09D
Codename: Mindmeld
Height: 4' 7"
Weight: 135lbs

Mindmeld is a Pokemon fusion of Alakazam and Gallade. He has the body structure of Alakazam, but has the horns of a Gallade on it's chest. His arms are Like a Gallade's, and has the hands of a Alakazam. Mindmeld's legs are like a Gallade's but has Alakazam's coloration. His head is like a Alakazam's, but has the crest and eyes of a Gallade.
---

Another experiment walked in. It looked kinda menacing.

"Did you say Unova?" he asked.

"Yes" said Brawl, "Does it sound familiar Mindmeld?"

"Unova is the fifth known region in this world. Unlike the others, Unova has all different Pokemon; none from any region live there. That's why we couldn't recognize the Pokemon parts when this kid came in, all the Pokemon DNA is from Unova."

They all looked at me in shock. Even I couldn't believe it. Suddenly, alarms blared. One man dressed in a lab coat ran in.

"Listen up!" he yelled. "I'm going to take one of you at a time to a different room. Don't try anything funny."

He walked in holding a staff that sparked a little. Brawl approached me, "When I tell you to, run."

"Why?" I asked silently.

"I read his mind. He is going to destroy us. The International Police found where they were hiding, so they're going to destroy all evidence of what they have done here."

The man stepped away from the door, and Brawl made a bolt for it. I followed him.
1313111.title: Learning

13131112.content:
I ran to and out the door. I was expecting Brawl to follow, but I heard a loud scream. I turned and saw Brawl veins electrocuted by the man. The man had a wide smile on his face. He removed the staff, and Brawl fell to the ground.

"Brawl!" I exclaimed.

"Kid...run!" he managed to say.

I looked at him, then tureen and saw the exit. I kept exchanging glances before I fell on one of then and stayed there.
13131112.title: Man Down!

131311121.content:
Without thinking, I ran back to the room and tackled the man. Brawl and some of the other Experiments looked at me funny, but it didn't worry me. I grabbed the bar with my mouth looking hands, and snapped it in half. Some odd feeling came over me, and sparks started to flow around me. I walked towards the man slowly, and he backed up.

"You hurt my friend, now I'm going to hurt you!" I said.

"W-What are y-you going t-to do?" he stuttered.

"I'm going to give you a taste of your own medicine!"

I grabbed him and I channeled electricity through my body. It hit the man and he was screaming in pain. A smile stretched across my face, but quickly disappeared. I realized what I was doing and stopped. Thankfully, the electricity knocked him out. I backed up slowly, only to bump into Brawl.

"What did I just do?!" I asked. I was kinda scared.

"Looks like you have sone powers of your own" he replied. He turned to the other experiments. "Everyone, we're free!"

All of the experiments ran out the door. I followed Brawl to the best of my ability, but I lost him. I came upon a forest, and everyone was gone. I was alone again. I turned and heard something. I hid in some bushes and listened.
131311121.title: Taste of Your Own Medicine

13132.content:
Experiment 12O
Nickname: Unova
Current Height: 4' 5"
Current Weight: 120lbs

Unova is a cross between six different Unova Pokemon. He has the lower body of a Galvantula, with some armor spikes from Ferrothorn. He has the upper body of a Dewott, with arms like a Hydreigon. Two wings like a Swoobat are out from it's back. Unova's head is like a Dewott, but he has the eyes like a Galvantula only they are red instead of blue,, and a cap like a Lampent.

---

I slowly woke up. Everything felt...strange. I was about to rub my head, where my arm looked like a Hydreigon's. I tried to get up, but I stumbled. I felt four legs instead of two. I quickly looked around, trying to find a mirror or something reflective. I found one, and nearly fainted again. I was a mix up of all six of my Pokemon. I was so freaky. A door opened, and scientist came in. It was the same scientist that transformed me.

"Awake are we?" he said.

"If you don't change me back now I swear I'll get out of this thing and make you sorry" I said.

"I suggest you stop talking. If our boss finds out you can speak human, we would have to defuse your DNA."

"So what? I don't want to be like this."

"Boy, you know nothing of science. If we diffuse your DNA, it will take the human DNA apart as well. So I would hush up."

A man walked in the room wearing a black suit. He had black hair, and mean looking eyes. He walked right in front of me and stared.

"What an excellent specimen" he said. "I am glad to see that the plan went accordingly."

"Thank you boss" said the scientist.

"All credit will be given to you Dr. Polk."

Dr. Polk?

They left the room, and left me alone. I curled up and began to cry.

I do not believe what I am. If I would have never listened to that man, I would be with my family, my friends that were coming later, and my...Pokemon.

I cried even more when I thought about my Pokemon. They were like family to me; they are family.
13132.title: Experiment 12O

131321.content:
I heard some alarms, and scientists ran in. They began to detach wires from my container. I looked around nervously.

"I cannot believe the International Police found us!" said Dr. Polk.

"What are we doing sir?" asked a man.

"We have orders to destroy all evidence of our experiments."

D...Des...Destroy!?!

"But sir, these are living beings!" said a woman. "We can't kill them!"

"Would you like to go to prison as well? If you don't, then keep working!"

They completely detached my chamber and the woman pushed me out. I looked at her, and she looked like she was going to tears.

"What ate you going to do with me?" I asked.

She looked up shocked, "You can talk?! Oh...this is going to be a lot harder."

"You dont have to do this! You do not have to listen to them. You are your own person, please don't do this to me!"

She still looked testy eyed. She still pushed me into a different room, where several other experiments were.
131321.title: Near Destruction

1313211.content:
The woman stopped my cart, and walked over to the main controls. She pressed a few keys, and every container pod hummed; even mine. Suddenly, all of them opened. I was able to crawl out with my Galvantula legs. Every other experiment managed to get out as well.

"You are..."

A experiment grabbed the woman's neck before she could finish her sentence. It looked like a cross between a Scizor and a Lucario. It had the body of a Lucario, with the hands, wings, and feet of a Scizor. I ran up to him, but I stumbled and just bumped into him. He looked down at me, and laughed.

"Move along junior" he said. "I got this one."

"Let her go!" I said.

"Do you know what they did to us? They turned all of us into freaks!"

"Do you know she did to us? They were going to destroy us to hide what they have done! She released all of us, and didn't stop us. If you're going to try and kill her, I'll battle you."

He laughed even harder, "You battle me...is this some kind of joke?"

All of the other experiments were silent.

"I am the greatest battler in this place. But, if you want a battle, you got it."

He let go, and got into a fighting position. The other experiments circled around, creating like a barrier. He ran forward with his claw glowing. I quickly stepped to the side faster than I expected. Even the one guy was surprised.

How did I do that? Wait, I have all of the DNA of my six Pokemon. That means all of my stats are the combination of theirs. This might be easier than I expected.

I jumped in the air and landed on his back. I sent electricity flying all around me. It mostly hit my opponent. He screamed in pain, but he threw me off. I landed, and used Will-O-Wisp. The guy was stilll stunned, so it hit him. He charged at me with glowing claws again. I used Scald, but he went threw. I used String Shot, and he got tied up. He struggled, but couldn't get free.

"Ready to give up?" I asked.

"You got guts kid" he said. "But what reason would I have to give up?"

Several scientists ran in, and looked astonished.

"The experiments have gotten free!" said one.

"Let's get them back to their containers!" said another. "We must eliminate the evidence!"

Everyone stepped back, except for me. I cut the other experiment free, and I spoke.

"Everyone, we're free!" I yelled. "You don't need to listen to them anymore, you don't need to fear them either! You are more powerful than them, stand up for yourselves!"

They talked amongst themselves, and they charged the scientists. Others ran out to the exit. Before I left, I stopped by the woman.

"Thank you" I said.

She nodded, and I ran out. There was a forest outside. Some of the others already ran off, but I heard something. I ducked into the bushes, and saw...
1313211.title: Trouble then Freedom

15.content: when i called you those two times... i had a block on what to say both times so i hung up... first time for everything i guess
15.title: i am trying to give patience a go

152.content: too much to ask for you to stop and talk to me?
152.title: i just wanted a say in my character.

1522.content:

1522.title: NO TIME TO TALK

info.brief_description: Live the life of a Pokemon cross breed.
info.description:
One day you are walking along, going about your normal life when suddenly strange men wearing black clothes capture you and take you to a top secret lab. There they perform experiments on you resulting in a strange mutation making you a Pokemon cross breed (A cross between two or more Pokemon). One day there was word that the international police had found the facility and was launching an investigation. Fearing being caught and arrested they where planning to terminate the experiments however one of the experiments got free and destroyed the facility freeing most of the experiments in the process. In the end the international police arrested them and sent the remaining experiments to a special home to live out there lives happily however where about of some of the other experiments is unknown. How will you, a Pokemon cross breed turn out in the normal world?

You will take the role of a Pokemon experiment that has escaped from the lab or a trainer that finds one of the experiments. You will create your own Pokemon cross breed and decide what happens to it. You can be rescued by a trainer, live in the wild or Pokemon reserve, or be transferred to a Pokemon only world.
Note: In this story Pokemon aren’t limited to 4 moves so any move a Pokemon can learn it can use. Also they can make there own original moves.

Rules

1:I want people to be able to make there own story if they want so if you make a character please leave the option to make another character.
2:On your character page when you make your cross breed please be very descriptive on what it looks like.
3:Please no sad or cruel endings. (I don’t like that kind of stuff)
4:Plaese keep swearing to a minimum.
5:No sexual content what so ever.

Have fun.
